item.description:
Desserts and Dessert Wines
----------------------------------------
I attended a Dessert and Dessert Wine seminar at the Boston Adult Community Education Center. The Pastry Chef, who worked at a few well known Boston restaurants, created 4 desserts and paired them with 4 dessert wines. With your help (our Pastry Chefs), we'll recreate this great seminar.


o Lemon Pudding Cake - Pam
o French Butter Pear Frangipane Tart - Debbie
o Pumpkin Mostarda Strudel - Celesta
o Chocolate Hazelnut Torta - Joan
o Blue Cheese and Roasted nuts - Dick and Eleanor


The dessert components might be a little pricey so we may need contribute a few $ to our Pastry Chefs.
The dessert wines are not expensive. I'll send a cost estimate a few days before the event.


This will be all the food and wine that's needed. I suggest you have a light dinner before the meeting.

Thanks,
Mike
item.name: AWS Nov Meeting
